Abilene.Logsdon Seminary:
Logsdon Seminary of Hardin-Simmons University is a Baptist theological seminary in Abilene, Texas. The school offers the Master of Divinity degree, the Master of Arts (Religion) degree, the Master of Arts in Family Ministry, and the Doctor of Ministry degree.


== Founding ==
Logsdon Seminary’s founding was largely shaped by the purpose of Hardin-Simmons University "To bring young men and women to Christ; to teach them of Christ; to train them for Christ.” The Logsdon School of Theology, was named for Charles and Koreen Logsdon of Abilene.
